content: Update Phase 1 with AVPlayerView implementation and enhanced error handling
Update Phase 2 with improved progress bar implementation
Update Phase 3 with performance-optimized marker rendering
Update Phase 4 with UUID-based seek queuing system
Update Phase 5 with native SwiftUI modals and keyboard shortcuts
Update Phase 6 with migration strategy for data persistence
Update Phase 7 with performance monitoring and metrics
Update Phase 8 with final integration improvements
